hero.title: Design Cloud Infrastructure
hero.description: Create, manage, and export cloud architecture diagrams with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Support for AWS, Azure, and GCP.

features.title: Everything you need to design infrastructure

visual.title: Visual Designer
visual.description: Drag-and-drop components to build your infrastructure

multiCloud.title: Multi-Cloud
multiCloud.description: Support for AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform

export.title: Export & Share
export.description: Export to Terraform, PDF, or share with your team

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together with your team in real-time

costEstimation.title: Cost Estimation
costEstimation.description: Get estimated costs for your infrastructure

cta.title: Ready to design your cloud infrastructure?
cta.description: Join thousands of engineers who use JobStack to design and manage their cloud architecture.

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.

projects.title: Projects
projects.emptyDescription: Create your first cloud infrastructure project

profile.title: Profile
profile.avatarHint: Enter a URL to your profile picture
profile.emailHint: Your email is managed by your authentication provider

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.themeDescription: Switch between light and dark mode

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.orgInvitesDescription: Receive email when invited to an organization
notifications.projectSharesDescription: Receive email when someone shares a project with you
notifications.accountAlertsDescription: Important notifications about your account security
notifications.weeklyDigestDescription: Summary of your projects and activity each week

dataPrivacy.title: Data & Privacy
dataPrivacy.description: Manage your data in compliance with GDPR (Art. 20)
dataPrivacy.exportDescription: Download a copy of all your data including profile, projects, diagrams and organizations

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Irreversible actions for your account. Deletion has a 7-day grace period.
dangerZone.deleteDescription: Permanently delete your account and all data
dangerZone.deleteConfirmDescription: Your account will be scheduled for deletion with a 7-day grace period. During this time you can cancel the deletion. After 7 days your account and all data will be permanently removed.
